page.title: 08Industry
page.content: The reason why we don't have{gas}in Paull is because the{gas}comes from Easington.The pressure of the{gas}is too high for us.It would cost hundreds of pounds to get it to the right pressure.{Twenty people}take it in turns to check the{gas terminal}in Paull. {Bulk Storage}is our main industry in the area.It is a company which makes {Acetylene Black} which is like soot and which used in{batteries.}They also store{acid}.The firm has seventeen trucks but only two of the drivers live in Paull.The pay is said to be good.The lorry drivers are allowed to drive eleven hours per day without a rest. They work 5am _5pm.
